partintro.para: Chart plugin is composed of Chart Service, which enables convenient generation of XML data for FusionChart Free (open source with the chart function) based on OXM(Object XML Mapping), and reference libraries necessary for executing Chart Service, Chart Flash files, and scripts (e.g. jquery.fusioncharts.js).
Install the chart plugin by entering commands in the Command window as follows.
Installation results can be checked by the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.
